availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David Pack Juett (Ballard County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, physician. Scott County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Juett and Catharine Kendrick Juett. Resident of Scott County in 1850. Physician in Ballard County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 416. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandville, p. 5. Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates â€“ Microfilm (1911-1964), Ballard County, 1915, no. 5838, Microfilm rolls #7016130-7041803, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky.
